slides.title: ORIGINS
slides.subtitle: CHAPTER I
slides.description: Where nature meets technology. The beginning of a new era requires a new perspective.

slides.title: VIBRANIUM
slides.subtitle: CHAPTER II
slides.description: Strength found in the deepest roots. Power that flows through the veins of the earth.

slides.title: FOREVER
slides.subtitle: CHAPTER III
slides.description: Legacy is not what you leave behind. It is what you weave into the lives of others.
